summary: THE TURN SIGNALS ONLY WORK SOME OF THE TIME. I CAN TURN THE HAZARDS ON AND THIS FIXES THE PROBLEM MOST TIMES TILL I TRY TO USE THE TURN SIGNALS AGAIN. I TOOK IT TO THE DEALER AND THEY COULDN'T FIND A PROBLEM. MY MECHANIC HAS LOOKED AT IT, WITNESSED THE PROBLEM, BUT CAN'T DETERMINE THE CAUSE. BOTH THE FUSES AND RELAY HAVE BEEN REPLACED TO TRY TO FIX THE PROBLEM. IT SEEMS TO BE WORSE WHEN IT RAINS OR IS DAMP OUT. *JB
